.. :changelog:

Release History
---------------

0.0.1 (2022-06-16)
+++++++++++++++++++

- Only support Python3.8, 3.9 and 3.10.
- Add custom properties support. PR-#2
- Add drop_rels in Package. PR-#5
- Add drop_rels in Part. PR-#5
- Add default NumberingPart. PR-#4
- Fix Python3.8+ __dict__ TypeError. PR-#6
- Add some typehint.
